Portland.BridgePort Brewing Company:
BridgePort Brewing Company is a brewery in Portland, Oregon, in the United States.


== History ==
BridgePort was founded in 1984 by local winemakers Richard and Nancy Ponzi, and the brewery claims in their trademark to be "Oregon's Oldest Craft Brewery". The initial brewing facility, the Columbia River Brewery, had a 600 barrel per year capacity.
